ProductInfo.Features:
16MP Resolution CMOS Sensor: The camera's 16 megapixel resolution image sensor keeps your images clear even out to the long end of the 8x optical zoom
8x Optical Zoom Lens: With its excellent 8x enhanced optical zoom you can be sure to capture subjects from great distances with ease
3.0" Rear Touchscreen Display: This camera has a bright 3.0" rear touchscreen LCD that not only provides a larger, clearer screen but also the ability to shoot images by touch. Having a large 3.0" screen also helps you compose images better
One-Button HD 720p Video Recording: There is a dedicated movie button on the back of the camera that lets you start and stop recording instantly. There is no need to go through layers of menus or operate switches or dials to switch to and from video recording mode
Macro Photo & PictBridge Modes: Capture great close-up details with the camera's macro mode and quickly print your photos with the convenient PictBridge technology built-in. Switch to macro mode and get all the gritty details of a close-up image
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid IS827 16MP Digital Camera, 8x Optical Zoom, 3.0" Rear Touchscreen Display, Red
